items.headline: This course focuses on how to effectively manage the people side of change in an organization.
objectives_summary: Define the dynamics of organizational change as it applies to the people involved.
Identify the types of change and the processes needed to make them successful.
Identify the techniques management can use in leading and managing the change.

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Job Interviews
items.headline: Get the Job You Really Want, Master Job Interview Skills, Find out What You Have to Do to Get that Dream Job!
objectives_summary: This course will provide much priceless information, such as: - why interviewers ask certain questions - what do interviewers really want to hear from you - how to avoid ruining your chances for getting the job you want - reveal the best way to answer interview questions  - reveal the most frequent job interview questions - and much, much more

visible_instructors.title: Nicole Le Maire
visible_instructors.job_title: Creating modern People Operations that work.

items.headline: Selection of HR Technology - how it can benefit your organization
objectives_summary: Determine the value of historical context (traditional versus modern) and connect those ideas to generational characteristics and the changing work-force.
Connect common HR Technology terminology and essential 21st century skills.
Feel more confident with technology through the improved understanding of how to choose, use, and monitor HR technology in the organization.
